title: 589. Reaction to MNF Game + Players Graded Higher Than Where They Were Drafted
itunes:title: 589. Reaction to MNF Game + Players Graded Higher Than Where They Were Drafted
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a special new episode. To start off, the guys give their takeaways from the Monday Night Football game between the Saints and Raiders, while focusing on Josh Jacobs, Alvin Kamara, Johnathan Abram and Drew Brees (1:45). Next, the pair discuss the value of playing under center and talk about teams that are having success under center (18:06). Then, the duo give their thoughts on Deion Sanders becoming the head football coach at Jackson State University and touch on what he brings to the school (23:49). Later, the guys highlight the immediate success of a few wide receivers that were traded in the offseason (35:48). To wrap up the show, DJ and Bucky look at players that they had graded higher than where they were drafted (38:30).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
